comments.comment:
chorus (sing two verses then one chorus)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rushing wind blow through this temple
Blowing out the dust within
Come and breathe your
Breath upon me
I've been born again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit I surrender
Take me where you want to go
Plant me by your living waters
Plant me deep so I can grow

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Jesus You're the one
Who set my spirit free
Use me Lord - glorify
Your Holy Name through me

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Separate me from this world Lord
Sanctify my life for you
Daily change me to your image
Help me bear good fruit for you

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Every day you're drawing closer
Trials come to test my faith
But when all is said and done Lord
It's been worth the wait
